title: permanently banned
body: riot please give me my account back ,i always carry my team and they   keep flaming me and they   go toxic on me  and if i reply them  i get perma  baned ,please riot unban my account please,i will reform my playstyle        and  i promise i wont flame or i wont being toxic on any one please return  my a ccount riot.

replies.body:
I went ahead and looked into your account history so I could get a good picture as to what led to this kind of ban. I'm seeing a few things that could have been taken pretty offensively, and there were several attempts to help you realize how certain behaviors could affect others. 

I don't want to go into too much of your personal info, but if you want to open up the discussion of exactly why you were banned you're more than welcome to hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
